definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Madagascar's limestone towers are a haven for strange species.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加的那些石灰石塔是奇異物種的天堂。

sentences.english: In parts of Saint Emilion the gravel lies on limestone base.
sentences.chinese: 部分聖愛米濃產區砂礫層都平鋪於石灰石土層上。

sentences.english: The lower limit of limestone size should be larger than minus 120 meshes.
sentences.chinese: 目篩下的石灰石顆粒的存在不利於玻璃的澄清。

sentences.english: The limestone pieces were given an antique look with a unique finish of sandblast and acid wash.
sentences.chinese: 石灰石磚在經過噴沙和酸洗加工後展現出獨特的風情。

sentences.english: A lime filtering cell is used to treat wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 用升流式石灰石濾池中和處理廢水。

sentences.english: The calcareous skeletons of this distinctive species have weathered out from the limestone matrix.
sentences.chinese: 這一獨特物種的鈣質骨骼已在石灰石矩陣中風化。

sentences.english: The limestone particles are heated rapidly to high temperature upon entry into the boiler furnace.
sentences.chinese: 當石灰石顆粒一進入鍋爐爐膛，就迅速被加熱到高溫。

sentences.english: The commonly used fluxes are limestone and dolomite.
sentences.chinese: 常用的熔劑有石灰石和白雲石。

sentences.english: The tooth of roll crusher is pointed, used for crushing coal, coke and limestone.
sentences.chinese: 破碎機的齒輪爲尖頭狀，用於碎煤，焦炭和石灰石。

sentences.english: They were built mainly of limestone quarried on the Giza plateau itself.
sentences.chinese: 他們建成的主要開採石灰石本身吉薩高原上。

sentences.english: Xigou Limestone Mine are JISCO group flux smelting base accessories.
sentences.chinese: 西溝石灰石礦是酒鋼集團的冶煉熔劑輔料基地。

sentences.english: It's in the mountains above Verona that the red limestone is quarried.
sentences.chinese: 紅色的石灰石是在維羅納城邊的山上開採出來的。

sentences.english: The pharmaceutical grade calcium chloride production is mainly adopted technology of the lime stone- hydrochloric acid.
sentences.chinese: 食品醫藥級氯化鈣產品主要採用鹽酸石灰石工藝生產。

sentences.english: A lime rock train at He-Ren Station, North-Link Line.
sentences.chinese: 北迴線和仁站內幸福水泥石灰石列車。

sentences.english: Spires of limestone tufa rise from the shores of California's Mono Lake.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲石灰石泉華柱聳立在加利福尼亞的莫諾湖之濱。
水泥是由石灰石製成的。
